cards.title: in/far way too long  口语

front.Original: And like most guys , I haven't been to the doctor in way too long
front.Explain: 基本等于 in a long time / ages ago 这件事情是很久以前的事情的   这两个比较中性
front.Usage:
She hasn't visited her hometown in way too long/in a long time 
她上次回家乡，是很久以前的事情了
vs for ages/ for a long time  状态持续的 how long 
in way too long: 非常口语，且extra emotion/ 觉得真的是太久了
in way too long: 否定句
in a long time : 否定，和疑问

back.Mysentence: I haven't gone  to the cinema in way too long .Has you talked to your friends in way too long  ?
back.Corrected: I haven't been   to the cinema in way too long .Has you talked to your friends in a long time ?
back.Explain: Have been to 去了回来了， have gone to 去了，还在那里；in way too long 只用于否定句

modules.moduleDesc: 每张卡对应一个综合场景/对话，包含我的版本+AI纠正+关联Module1知识点

cards.Mysentence: I was playing on my phone when an notification pops up ,and I'm like "are you for real? "  . My friend had wanted to borrow 10,000 dollors, but I refused. Inundated with a bunch of text, I felt personally victimized by the criticisms from other friends .I am lost about friendship.
cards.Corrected: I was playing on my phone when an notification pops up ,and I'm like "are you for real? "  . My friend had asked to borrow 10,000 dollors, but I refused. Inundated with a bunch of text, I felt personally victimized by the criticisms from other friends .I am lost about friendship.
cards.Explain: 不能用want to 虽然中文是想借钱，但是事实上，借钱这件事情已经发生了，我才会拒绝。所以这个时候asks to 请求（）中文的想：内心想法 ；恳求

cards.Mysentence: As we are inundated with jargons and often lost about the stuff we actually wander about, I'll be talking business without jargon. You know ,we haven't had a business talk in way too long and it's hard to get real answers when everything sounds so complicated. And I'm like , "Why not make the stuff easier "
cards.Corrected: As we are inundated with jargons and often lost about the stuff we actually wander about, I'll be talking business without jargon. You know ,we haven't had a business talk in far way too long and it's hard to get real answers when everything sounds so complicated. And I'm like , "Why not just keep it simple"
cards.Explain: 1. keep it simple 是口语中常用表达，意为简单些，比"make the stuff easier"更自然；2. in way too long 是核心口语表达，in far way too long 是其强化形式，far 用于加强时隔太久的语气，符合日常对话习惯

cards.Mysentence: I haven't visited my parents in way too long . I was talking business and they suddenly shout "you should get married as soon as possible", and I'm like "What's happened ? What are you talking about?" Inundated with pressure of getting married , I decided to discuss the benefit and drawback of marriage with jardon and get real answers. My parent was lost  and felt personally victimized by the stuff they actually don't wonder about.
cards.Corrected: I haven't visited my parents in way too long. I was talking business when they suddenly shout, "You should get married as soon as possible," and I'm like, "What just happened? What are you even talking about?" Inundated with pressure to get married, I decided to talk about the pros and cons of marriage without jargon and get some real answers. My parents were totally lost and felt personally victimized by stuff they never even cared about.
cards.Explain: 1. 时态/场景表达："What's happened?" 侧重“近期已发生且有可见影响的事”，此处用 "What just happened?" 更贴合“突然发生”的即时场景，口语中也常用 "What's going on?" 表“当前情况”；2. 词汇替换："benefit and drawback" 较书面，口语用 "pros and cons" 更自然，"with jargon" 逻辑相反，需改为 "without jargon"（无术语），"wonder about"（认知上好奇）需改为 "care about"（情感上在意），更符合“父母因不关心的事感到被冒犯”的语境；3. 语法细节："parent" 需改为复数 "parents"，"pressure of getting married" 需调整为 "pressure to get married"（正确搭配）。

cards.Mysentence: We heard the new that Tom was fired and we were like "What's the story with this?" His boss spilled the details. He felt personally victimized by Tom's bad words. Later Tom got real with his boss about his attitude and got a working hack --- repecting everyone in the office.
cards.Corrected: We heard the new that Tom was fired and we were like "What's the story with this?" His boss spilled the details. He felt personally victimized by Tom's harsh words. Later Tom got real with his boss about his attitude and got/pick up a working hack --- repecting everyone in the office.
cards.Explain: 1. 词汇区别：bad words 特指“骂人的粗话、脏话”；harsh words 指“伤人的、刻薄的、严厉的言语”，此处老板因Tom的言语感到被冒犯，用 harsh words 更贴合语境（非粗话，而是伤人的话）；2. 核心口语表达对应 Module 1 具体卡片：① What's the story with this?（对应 Module 1 第9张）；② spilled the details（对应 Module 1 第7张）；③ got real with his boss（对应 Module 1 第10张）。

cards.scene: 家庭学习沟通（作业冲突）场景
cards.Mysentence: I was playing video games with my friends when my parents put me on notice to finish my homework ,and I'm like, "There is no end to homework". I didn't listen to them and my parent felt triggered by my attitude . So I got real with my parents about my thought :"When my teacher talks science with jargon ,I am alway lost and can't get the real answer". Then my father told me his learning hack - "When you want to get the stuff that you actually wonder about , just ask your teacher to say it again. Don't worry , he will not feel personally victimized." The next day ,I spilled the detais with my friends and they are like , "For really , we haven't talked to him in way too long"
cards.Corrected: I was playing video games with my friends when my parents suddenly put me on notice to finish my homework ,and I'm like, "There is no end to homework". I didn't listen to them and my parents totally felt triggered by my attitude . So I got real with my parents about how I felt :"When my teacher talks science with jargon ,I am alway lost and can't get the real answer". Then my father shared his learning hack - "If you really want to get the stuff that you actually wonder about , just ask your teacher to say it again. Don't worry , he will not feel personally victimized." The next day ,I spilled the detais with my friends and they are like , "For real , we haven't talked to him in way too long"
cards.Explain: 1. 词汇与表达优化：① "my thought" 过于正式，口语中用 "how I felt" 更自然；② "told me his learning hack" 中 "told" 仅表传递信息，用 "shared" 更体现分享经验；③ "For really" 改为 "For real"（口语正确表达）；2. 语法细节："my parent" 改为复数 "my parents"；3. 核心表达对应 Module 1 知识点：triggered（第13张）、talk science with jargon（第6张）。
